page.title: 11TRANSPORT ERDINGTON
page.content: Forty five families replied to a questionnaire on transport. Cars: 90% of the families own cars.50% use these for work and shopping and 70% for leisure activities. In most families father is the only driver but in 40% of the sample mother also drives. Buses: Less than 30% of the families use buses regularly for work, shopping and leisure activities. The services used most are the 11, 102, 103 and 104 routes to the City. Trains: The nearest station for most houses is Erdington (Station Road) but less than 15% use a train regularly. Most common destinations are Birmingham New Street and Sutton Coldfield. 25% of the adults use a bicycle regularly but less than 10% travel on motor cycles.
